deploy.startCommand: DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=grua_platform.settings_railway python manage.py migrate --verbosity=2 && DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=grua_platform.settings_railway python manage.py createadmin && DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=grua_platform.settings_railway python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --verbosity=2 && DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=grua_platform.settings_railway gunicorn grua_platform.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --timeout 120 --workers 3
